Так то игра 10\10

ฟรีฟายสนุกมากเลยครับ ⭐⭐⭐⭐
Moves great, players are nice, the lobby has some bugs tho, sometimes you might get disconnected from the lobby but the game is great and fun to be played with friends.
gutes Game macht bock, Dlc's zu kaufen macht süchtig.

Fun game and this game is awesome with friends, BUT there are some annoying things that come with this game such like campers and tunnellers but thats just the people and how they wanto play so..... game:awesome people:can be annoying
Fuck Legion, Fuck Michael, Fuck The Hag and Fuck The Doctor

Gets boring pretty fast. They've gotten better with leveling. 

But the games as a whole just get boring. It's honestly not a bad game for $20, so if you can catch it for $10 buy it. 

6/10 just not my type of game, but I'll play it occasionally.
gefällt mir, bloß viele toxic killer unterwegs :^)

GRA jest kurwa zbugowana i nie dziala nie kurwa polecam to jest żart zrobiłem tylko achivemnty, i wbilem dla nich range nie bylo to trudne ale niech cie to nie dźiwi bo to guwno jest nie grywalne i każdy morderca Kampi a nie gra kurwa.

Ta gra zeszła na psy nie polecam bo w to sie nie da grać po pierwszej grze robie zazwyczaj ALT+F4 a nastepnie walcze ze sobą emocjonalnie żeby jej nie odinstalować. 

A to jak hujowy jest Fort.. wiadomo jakie gówno to nic z bugami w tej grze kiedy biegniesz po przeskoczeniu przez palete ale zabujca i tak cie trafia z 2 metrów. 
A Umiejętności używaj 1.25 sekundy wcześniej bo ta gra za wolno myśli. 
Wystarczy że zobaczycie jaki kolwiek film na Youtubie to sie dowiecie ze kurwa nie warto,
bo w tych czasach zamiast przy tej grze dobrze sie bawic to sie tylko nawkurwiasz. 

dziękuje za uwage, znany krytyk Max Gesler
Very fun game to play with friends, but its not fun when one of those friends rage quits

This game is the Most unbalanced one that I ever see. Broken hitboxes, bad behavior are legits (camp,facecamp,tunnel,bodyblock...), cheater are not ban, devs constantly up killers making survivor gameplay just impossible. This game was good but devs voluntarily unbalance the game. (I'm playing both sides)

这是一款很有意思的游戏
虽然对萌新玩家不太友好
这游戏有点刺激√

Gioco di merda pieno di problemi, i dev non si curano di questi problemi perchè hanno talmente tanta merda davanti che se ne sbattono dei problemi del gioco, molto meglio investire sulle skin o altre cazzate piuttosto che aggiustare le meccaniche di gioco. 
Colpi che non dovrebbero prenderti, atteggiamenti di alcuni giocatori che non vengono presi in considerazione dai dev, sbilanciamento sia in alcuni killer che nel gen rush dei surv, spawn del ruin servito su un piatto d'argento ai surv, assegnazione dei punti completamente sbagliata (es. i surv finiscono i gen in 5 secondi perdi il punto, ma se il killer uccide in 5 secondi allora il punto o si mantiene o si perde, problema maggiormente visto ai ranghi rossi).
Un gioco di merda.

P. S. Dopo mesi l'ho riscaricato e posso confermare l'ultima frase della recensione... è un gioco di merda.
Sviluppatori di dbd se leggerete mai questa recensione, dubito perchè avete i dollari sugli occhi, sappiate che siete dei coglioni.
Cidden kaliteli bir oyun, hem rekabet hem eğlence için birebir.

absolute blast of a game. loading times sometime take a while.

EDIT 22 july 2022

theyve gone and done it! theyve messed the game up. theyve messed up spinechill. uninstalled after 1200 hours of gameplay, what a shame.

Al inicio es muy interesante, divertido y curioso, pero después de varias horas de juego se hace aburrido porque no cambia en nada los mapas y los enemigos, aunque son diferentes, no manejan una igualdad y siempre sabes que si te toca contra alguna en específico, la partida podrá ser más difícil o más fácil. Claramente esto depende del jugador, pero se nota la ventaja sobre los personajes gratis a los de pago y eso puede resultar muy molesto.

Played this back in 2018 with a couple of friends, absolute shitshow, the game is awful in almost every mechanic and there is nothing to do but complain while playing the game, the community is absolutely garbage and should be left to die on this game, but then again, good luck meeting the community at all, even at peak hours, getting a match usually takes an hour. An hour, that's not an exaggeration by the way, if you're playing on european server, there are absolutely no survivors playing, because everyone is obviously gonna go for killer, the (objectively / by the most community) favoured role.
The core mechanics become Very repetitive and VERY boring Incredibly quickly to the point of providing absolutely 0 stimulation to any part of your body due to the fact that this game is incredibly unfun, unrewarding and pretty much a fucking embarassment if you take the scary factor as the main point of this game, which was the case at launch.
TL;dr: the game isn't dead, but it is essentially impossible to have fun on it anymore due to the lackluster community and the pathetically lazy developers, they ain't even incompetent for fuck sake, it's a shame, absolute 2/10 game
J'aime sa jeux car il est bien
El mejor juego que he probado, ha cambiado mi vida vamos. Lo recomiendo 100%!!

The game is fun with friends, but it's a bit shit and unfair tbh. The dev has done a "pretty good job" and mainly buffs the killer/nerfs the survivor. We either convert the devs to survivors or we take em' out of the view.
просто чит игра , в особенности с друзьями.Всем советую , пока скидка есть.(Без скидки не покупал бы)
ce jeux est formidable ^^ je vous le recommande
The game is more addicting than crack cocaine
风格玩法我都很喜欢，也算是众多游戏里比较亮眼的那一类，而且就大家都比较关心的充值话题来说，在这游戏里充值并不会让你变强，能让你变强的只有对游戏机制的理解和在游戏中所积累的经验，如果五星满分的话，我给六星，在这里向游戏制作团队献上我的敬意，谢谢你们
играйте в дискорде в соло нет )
Играй, строй кирпичный завод и снова играй....Чтоб было что продавать...

Very nerve racking to play by yourself at first, but after a while you get used to it. Very good mechanics and gameplay

세일하여 구매하려는 사람들은 얼른 뒤로가기 버튼을 눌러라

유튜브 혹은 스트리머들 방송을 보고 구매하려는 사람들도 얼른 뒤로가기 버튼을 눌러라

입문은 쉽다 1~2만원 체험비 낸다 치고 하고싶다면 그리하여라

하지만 심화과정은 너무 어렵다

본인은 450시간정도를 하였음에도 아직 어렵다

데바데는 밸런스 조율이 영원한 숙제인 것 같다

무슨 패치를 하던 저랭에서는 살인마가 생존자 후둘겨 패고 다니면서 날뛰고

고랭에서는 생존자가 살인마 등뒤에 칼을 찌르며 시간을 빌려오는 마법도 부리고 

판자를 내려가며 손가락질과 싸다구를 날리기 바쁘다

Muito bom melhor jogo que ja joguei

2021.2.10的改动像一坨shit，不对它连一坨shit都不如。本来国服好好的现在莫名其妙会连的别的服务器。隔着5米都能给你来一刀。，设计师不玩游戏知道一直按着手不酸吗？这，ui全面大改像手游也就算了，新跑步姿势是哪个脑瘫设计出来的？要不要送这位人才去下疗养院让老杨治疗一下？还有esc自动修机砍没了？一直按着手不痛？设计师玩杀机吗？建议送到疯人院和护士姐姐亲亲。跟他妈挺尸一样zzz. 我可qnmd，这更新直接不想玩了呵呵
